education.text: Erasmus exchange at Aarhus School of Architecture. Fall Semester.
A bachelor’s Degree in Architecture, Pontificia Universidad Católica del Perú.

academic.text: Research and teching position at Faculty of Architecture at KU Leuven, Campus Brussels. Elective course: Altering Practices for Urban Inclusion
Kosovo Architecture Festival: Lecture and Workshop

lectures.text: Seminar: Commons, Wilds, and Infrastructure. University of London, Institute in Paris. France.
Dialogue Series: Mother of all Arts - Run the World. Berlinische Galerie. Berlin-Germany.
Opening of the chapter Emancipation of the exhibition Institution Building at CIVA. Brussels-Belgium.
NAF/NAAR Symposium: Concepts of Transformation. Aarhus School of Architecture, Denmark.
Annual meeting of the Institute of Andean Studies. Berkeley-USA.
Conversatorio Proyectar en el Centro Histórico. Urban Hall, Lima-Peru.

exhibitions.text: Insitu: Open school on Situated Creative Practices. Brussels-Belgium.
Neighborhood Stories Oslo Architecture Triennale. Norway.
We are the next Generation. Kortrijk Creativity Festival. Belgium.
Sonic Urbanism. BNA-BBOT Gallery, Brussels. Belgium.

publications.title: Sagitario in Queer Spaces: An Atlas of LGBTQIA+ Places and Stories.
publications.text: Edited by Adam Nathaniel Furman and Joshua Mardell. Published by Royal Institute of British Architects (RIBA) Publishing. London-England.

publications.title: Future Architecture book.
publications.text: Edited by: Milan Dinevski and Damjan Kokalevski. Published by Museum of Architecture and Design. Ljubljana-Slovenia.

publications.title: Queer Spheres in Forest, Body, City, Flow. Landscapes of Care.
publications.text: Editors: Yue Mao, Naomi van Dijck, Radha Smith – NOMAOS (eds.). Publisher: dpr-barcelona. Spain.

recognitions.text: Artistic Grant Kunstendecreeet 2022. Given by the Ministry of Culture of the Flemish Government.
Second place in POTY 2020: Photo of the year competition. Organized by Aarhus School of Architecture
KU Leuven travel grant. Participation in Cooperation Project in Cambodia
